actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Forest Management Act of 1976 to prohibit below-cost timber sales in the Shawnee National Forest.
short_title: Taxpayer and Shawnee National Forest Protection Act

summary.text: Taxpayer and Shawnee National Forest Protection Act - Amends the National Forest Management Act of 1976 to prohibit below-cost timber sales in the Shawnee National Forest.

titles.title: Taxpayer and Shawnee National Forest Protection Act
A bill to amend the National Forest Management Act of 1976 to prohibit below-cost timber sales in the Shawnee National Forest.
